resolutions.description: Per-resolution crop presets. Use 'default' when no exact match.

default.description: Fallback preset when current resolution is not listed.

settings.brightness_gain_desc: Linear multiplier applied before gamma. <1.0 darkens globally; >1.0 brightens.
settings.brightness_gamma_desc: Gamma exponent applied after gain. >1.0 darkens mid/highlights; <1.0 brightens.
settings.fps_desc: Unified rate for capture and matching (frames per second). Lower to reduce CPU/GPU load.
